### NONSTATIONARY MODELS {.text-wash-red style="font-size: 1.6em;"}

####  NEED MORE PARAMETERS {.text-wash-pink style="font-size: 1.3em; margin-left: 50px;"}


::: {.fragment .fade-in}
Generic nonstationary model for annual maximum precipitation:
$$
y(\vb{s}, t) \sim \text{GEV} \left( \mu(\vb{s}, t), \sigma(\vb{s}, t), \xi(\vb{s}, t) \right)
$$
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
**Process-informed** models condition parameters on climate indices $\vb{X}(t)$ [@schlef_idf:2023;@cheng_nonstationary:2014]
$$
\theta(\vb{s}, t) = \alpha + \overbrace{\beta(\vb{s})}^\text{more params} \times \overbrace{\vb{X}(t)}^\text{climate}
$$
for $\theta \in \{\mu, \sigma, \xi \}$
:::
